products.name: 5200 Legacy Bundle
products.description: The 5200 is one of the most popular Vitamix blenders we've ever designed, and it's still topping "Best Blender" lists to this day. Included in this bundle are the Personal Cup Adaptor, which turns a full size blender into a personal blender, a spatula, and a tamper holder. Find out why this classic has endured year after year.

products.name: Ascent® X2
products.description: The Ascent X Series is Vitamix's premium blender line. Its reimagined design combines an intuitive interface with a sophisticated, timeless look that feels at home in any home. It's the best in blending, enhanced by customer feedback and updated for the modern kitchen. The Ascent X2 features a 48-ounce Container, an automatic Self-Cleaning Program, and three Blending Programs (Smoothies, Frozen Desserts, and Soups). Add SELF-DETECT® containers and attachments to build a customized blending system designed to fit your needs.
products.tagline: Premium blender with intuitive design and advanced blending capabilities

products.name: Ascent® X2 SmartPrep™ Kitchen System
